textBox.richText: Idiap organized the 2nd competition on face recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database in conjunction with The 6th IAPR/IEEE International Conference on Biometrics (http://atvs.ii.uam.es/icb2013/) June 4-7, 2013 Madrid SPAIN. The competition is now closed, results from the competition will be presented at the conference and available in the proceedings: M. Günther, A. Costa-Pazo, C. Ding, E. Boutellaa, G. Chiachia, H. Zhang, M. de Assis Angeloni, V. ~Struc, E. Khoury, E. Vazquez-Fernandez, D. Tao, M. Bengherabi, D. Cox, S. Kiranyaz, T. de Freitas Pereira, J. ~Zganec-Gros, E. Argones-Rúa, N. Pinto, M. Gabbouj, F. Sim oes, S. Dobrišek, D. González-Jiménez, A. Rocha, M. Uliani Neto, N. Pavešić, A. Falc ao, R. Violato, and S. Marcel. The 2013 face recognition evaluation in MOBIO environment. In IAPR International Conference on Biometrics (ICB), 2013. (to appear). More information at: http://www.beat-eu.org/evaluations/icb-2013-face-recognition-mobio
The 2nd competition on face recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database
